definition: A dental procedure involving the repair or replacement of a damaged or decayed tooth structure, typically using various materials such as fillings, crowns, or bridges. It is commonly performed by dentists to restore the functionality and aesthetics of a tooth.

examples.english: The dental restoration was very expensive.
The dental restoration took several hours.

examples.german: Die Zahnrestauratione wurde von einem Spezialisten durchgef√ºhrt.
examples.english: The dental restoration was performed by a specialist.
